subject: Adding New MMS SearchMsg/GetMsgCount() apis in Tizen::Messaging::MmsMessage/MmsManager/SmsManager Class updated review comments
commitMessage:
Adding New MMS SearchMsg/GetMsgCount() apis in Tizen::Messaging::MmsMessage/MmsManager/SmsManager Class updated review comments

Change-Id: Ie017a2789d3af0e41fccbefd8f6071119c0bcf3d
Signed-off-by: shivajm <shiva.jm@samsung.com>

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.

Patch Set 1: Verified+1 Code-Review+1

Updated the review comments for "https://lists.tizen.org/pipermail/tsg-arch-api/2014-January/000069.html".
please ignore the old review posted at "https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/#/c/14099/", i had some issue in uploading the updates to same URL with error "Error in building the tree".

Patch Set 1:

I wonder what is the primary use case of searching by keyword in the first 150 chars of messages. I understand we don't provide generic filters for messages, but this one still doesn't enable implementing the generic filters required by e.g. Tizen Messaging API (https://developer.tizen.org/dev-guide/2.2.1/org.tizen.web.device.apireference/tizen/messaging.html ). So I wonder what is the use case.

Patch Set 1:

The parameter keyword will be used to search the message body contents, user can retrieve messages which has some particular keywords, for listing the messages.
Patch Set 1: Code-Review+1

Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

(3 comments)

Patch Set 1:

Dear Zoltan,

Are you proposing adding a search API with filter argument similarly to Web Device API?
Uploaded patch set 2.

Patch Set 2: Verified+1 Code-Review+1

Updated the review comments.
Patch Set 2: Code-Review+1

Patch Set 2:

I don't have the right to give +2 for this git.
Patch Set 2: Code-Review+2

Patch Set 2:

Dear Zoltan,

Could you submit this patch if you're the maintainer for this git?
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

- Git project: platform/framework/native/messaging

- Request URL:https://build.tizen.org/request/show/21021

Patch Set 2:

The tag submit/trunk/20140213.081907 was pushed, but it was not completed because of the following reason(s):

- The tag means you want to submit commit d638931bcd5bf0b7c5e58f2be31c5b1adb2e4810 in master branch to OBS, but this commit does NOT exist in master branch. Please use correct branch name as version in tag name submit/{version}/{date.time}.

Suggest to use "gbs submit" to trigger submission, or use following command to create tag "git tag submit/${version}/$(date --utc +%%Y%%m%%d.%%H%%M%%S) -m "****" ".

Patch Set 2:

The SR (Submit Request) has been accepted to OBS Tizen:Mobile project.

Patch Set 1:

(41 comments)

A lot of whitespace editing, but if at it, please remove trailing white spaces.

Try to keep code lines 80 chars long if possible (but it is not blocking this request).

Some hardcoded paths (to be fixed later).

As a side note, for the future, it would be good to switch using C++11.

Patch Set 1:

Please allow time for review, and do not automatically merge in 2 hours time. Next time I will revert the change!
